column4: I hear you. That internet never seems to work quite like one wants it to.
Could anyone help me install a .desktop so that it shows up in Applications/Sound & Video (hoary)?
you are going to have to install a menu editor, it was jsut released yesterday
let me see if I can find it for you
DOH. Lemme doublecheck how it's done in /usr/share/applications (silly me)
download and sudo -s to get to a root console, dpkg -i menueditor_0.1-1_i386.deb and meun-editor to run it .....has to be run by root user
is that because it edits the /usr/share/applications directory?
then why do I need root? If it edits ~/.local/share/applications, I shouldn't need root. In fact, it would be detrimental..
also, the newest version supports non-root editing, it would seem.
he must have changed it recently :)
bad bad bad Travis Watkins. He hasn't included python docstrings *waves fist at mr. Watkins*
